extension.name: Remote Datasource
extension.description: A datasource that consumes XML, JSON, CSV or TEXT content.

releases.release: - Make CSV style configurable. - Fix `{$workspace}` path
- Fix a bug with late static binding on PHP 5.3.
- Fix the first cache of a result always resulting in an error - Abstract the transformers for better extensibility
- Expose the CURL error via `httpError()` - Fix error with CSV importing
- Add support for text format (a copy of the html response body) - Add some documentation

- Add support for Symphony 2.4 - Support CSV data format - Allow `$gateway` to be manipulated and `$data` to previewed - When the Datasource fails, data is added to the `?debug` page to assist in debugging - Allow no cache to be set - Sanitize XPath to allow for more complex queries

- Officially release the extension - Add `url` to the resulting XML result so you can see what URL was actually fetched - Fix bug where a result would always be `stale` - Allow timeout to be user configurable in the Data Source Editor - Various PHP E_NOTICE fixes
